original: @190b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @190b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma h'a y'a na si gra ha au pa ni bandha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a y'a na si gra ha au pa ni bandha nam /
translated: Mahayana-siddhi-grantha-bandhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar /
analyzed: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar /
translated: The Explanation of the Compendium of the Great Vehicle

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Part One

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri

original: slob dpon snga mas rigs tshul du //
analyzed: slob dpon snga mas rigs tshul du //
translated: The previous master, in a systematic way,

original: rnam par phye bas blo zhen rnams //
analyzed: rnam par phye bas blo zhen rnams //
translated: Analyzed it, so that those with conceptual minds

original: mi rtogs pas na tshigs te nas //
analyzed: mi rtogs pas na tshigs te nas //
translated: Would not be overwhelmed, and thus

original: bsdus pa rnam par dbye bar bya //
analyzed: bsdus pa rnam par dbye bar bya //
translated: Compiled it in a systematic way.

original: don bcus theg pa chen po mtha' dag gon du bsdu bar 'dod pas bstan bcos kyi lus kyi bdag nyid don bcu po de dag gtsug lag nyid du brjod pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: don bcus theg pa chen po mtha' dag gon du bsdu bar 'dod pas bstan bcos kyi lus kyi bdag nyid don bcu po de dag gtsug lag nyid du brjod pa'i sgo nas /
translated: Desiring to include the entire Great Vehicle within ten topics, he, through expressing the ten topics that are the body of the treatise as being the very scriptures,

original: theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gleng slong bar byed do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gleng slong bar byed do //
translated: Engages in the introduction, saying Those who have thoroughly entered the Great Vehicle... and so forth.

original: yon tan gyi tshig gam btags pa la theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa zhes bya bas te /
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshig gam btags pa la theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa zhes bya bas te /
translated: Thoroughly entered the Great Vehicle refers to the words or designations of qualities.

original: 'dis theg pa chen po shin tu rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: 'dis theg pa chen po shin tu rtogs pa'am /
translated: By this, they have thoroughly realized the Great Vehicle,

original: de la shin tu zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de la shin tu zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: He is a great vehicle practitioner because he has entered the great vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa gzungs dang spobs pa'i yon tan thob pa theg pa chen po'i don 'dzin pa dang rab tu ston par nus pa des sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa gzungs dang spobs pa'i yon tan thob pa theg pa chen po'i don 'dzin pa dang rab tu ston par nus pa des sam /
translated: The bodhisattva who has entered the great vehicle, who has attained the virtues of retention and eloquence, and who is able to grasp and teach the meaning of the great vehicle,

original: ming de skad ces bya bas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya bas gsungs pa'o //
translated: or who is called by that name.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'di byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'di byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: The bodhisattva is so called because he is intent on enlightenment and on beings.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir srog chags brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir srog chags brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word sattva here means a living being.

original: dmigs pas kyang de skad ces bya bar snang ste /
analyzed: dmigs pas kyang de skad ces bya bar snang ste /
translated: It is also called that because it is the object of the word.

original: dper na mi sdug pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mi sdug pa dang / stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / ngan par byas pa la dmigs pa'i yid la gcags pa la 'gyod pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mi sdug pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mi sdug pa dang / stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / ngan par byas pa la dmigs pa'i yid la gcags pa la 'gyod pa zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the concentration that has an ugly object is called the concentration on the ugly, and that which has emptiness as its object is called emptiness. Remorse that has a bad action as its object is called remorse.

original: yang na 'di byang chub kyi phyir sran thub pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'di byang chub kyi phyir sran thub pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: Or else, he is a bodhisattva because he is patient for the sake of enlightenment.

original: theg pa chen po'i che ba'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni zab pa dang / rgya che ba gnyis kyis bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i che ba'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni zab pa dang / rgya che ba gnyis kyis bla na med pa'o //
translated: The greatness of the Mahayana is its unsurpassability in terms of both profundity and amplitude.

original: bdag gi sgra ni ngo bo nyid dang / byed pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: bdag gi sgra ni ngo bo nyid dang / byed pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúself‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúgreat self‚Äù is a term for essence and action.

original: dper na me ni tsha ba'i bdag nyid /
analyzed: dper na me ni tsha ba'i bdag nyid /
translated: For example, fire is said to have the essence of heat,

original: dug ni 'chi bar byed pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba lta bu'o /üîΩ'di ni che ba'i bdag nyid yin pas che ba ste /
analyzed: dug ni 'chi bar byed pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba lta bu'o / 'di ni che ba'i bdag nyid yin pas che ba ste /
translated: and poison is said to have the essence of killing.

original: de'i dngos po ni che ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni che ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: This is the greatness of the Mahayana, and its reality is the greatness of the Mahayana.

original: de brjod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag rang gis mi shes pas de rab tu bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de brjod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag rang gis mi shes pas de rab tu bshad pa'o //
translated: The expression of that is the expression of the greatness of the Mahayana.

original: phyir zhes bya @191a * //
analyzed: phyir zhes bya @191a * //
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù

original: bas ni dgongs pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bas ni dgongs pa bstan pa'o //
translated: indicates the explanation of the intention.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba la bdud bzhi bcom pa dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das te sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba la bdud bzhi bcom pa dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das te sangs rgyas so //
translated: In the presence of the Lord means in the presence of the Buddha, who is called Lord because he has conquered the four demons and possesses the qualities of lordship, etc.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it will be said below that the Buddha is the Lord.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang bas yid brtan du rung ba nyid du ston te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang bas yid brtan du rung ba nyid du ston te /
translated: The phrase in the presence of the Lord indicates that the teaching is reliable because it was given by the Buddha.

original: ston pa dang nye na gzhan du mi smra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ston pa dang nye na gzhan du mi smra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For, when one is in the presence of the Teacher, one does not speak falsely.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnas bcu nye bar 'dod par 'god pa ston to //üîΩtheg pa chen po las brtsams nas zhes bya ba ni de'i ched du'am /üîΩdbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnas bcu nye bar 'dod par 'god pa ston to // theg pa chen po las brtsams nas zhes bya ba ni de'i ched du'am / dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The phrase that is to say introduces the ten topics that are to be discussed.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
translated: The phrase beginning with the Great Vehicle means that the teaching is for the sake of the Great Vehicle or is governed by the Great Vehicle.

original: 'jig rten pa las brtsams pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa las brtsams pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It does not begin with the Disciple Vehicle or with the mundane.

original: yang theg pa chen po smos pa ni 'di kho na las brtsams kyi gzhan las brtsams pa ni ma yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: yang theg pa chen po smos pa ni 'di kho na las brtsams kyi gzhan las brtsams pa ni ma yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: Moreover, the expression ‚ÄúGreat Vehicle‚Äù is used in order to ascertain that this treatise is based on the Great Vehicle and not on other vehicles.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa las brtsams nas /
translated: Thus, the Buddha‚Äôs word is superior to other teachings in various ways, such as the following:

original: bden par smra bya khro mi bya //
analyzed: bden par smra bya khro mi bya //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should speak the truth and not get angry;

original: slong la chung yang sbyin par bya //
analyzed: slong la chung yang sbyin par bya //
translated: one should give even a little to those who ask.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan dag las sangs rgyas kyi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //üîΩnyan thos kyi dbang du byas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan dag las sangs rgyas kyi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // nyan thos kyi dbang du byas na /
translated: From the point of view of the disciples, the Buddha‚Äôs word is superior to other teachings, such as the following:

original: kye ma 'du byed rtag pa med //
analyzed: kye ma 'du byed rtag pa med //
translated: ‚ÄúAlas! Conditioned things are impermanent;

original: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags te /
analyzed: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags te /
translated: they have the nature of arising and ceasing.‚Äù

original: de lta bas na nges par bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: de lta bas na nges par bya bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to ascertain that the Buddha‚Äôs word is superior to other teachings.

original: chos mngon par theg pa chen po'i mdo las zhes bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rgyu'am /
analyzed: chos mngon par theg pa chen po'i mdo las zhes bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rgyu'am /
translated: The expression ‚Äúin the Abhidharma of the Great Vehicle‚Äù means that this treatise is based on the Abhidharma of the Great Vehicle and not on the Abhidharma of other vehicles.

original: grags pa'i phyir chos mngon par ming btags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo khyad par can las gsungs kyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grags pa'i phyir chos mngon par ming btags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo khyad par can las gsungs kyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: The name Abhidharma is given to the Mahayana sutras, because they are renowned for their extensive teaching of the factors of enlightenment, but not to other sutras.

original: de ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pa'am /
analyzed: de ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pa'am /
translated: The Mahayana is the vehicle of the great ones, or the great vehicle.üîΩIt is the vehicle of the great ones because it is the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who are great beings mahat because of their great compassion, their great accumulation of provisions, their great abandonment, and their great wisdom.

original: chen po rnams kyi theg pa yin pas theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po rnams kyi theg pa yin pas theg pa chen po ste /
translated: It is the great vehicle because it is the vehicle of the great ones, or because it is great as the vehicle of those great beings.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu che ba'i phyir byed pa dang / bgrod par bya ba bsgrub pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu che ba'i phyir byed pa dang / bgrod par bya ba bsgrub pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is great because it is the cause and result of the great, i.e., of the abandonment and direct intuition of all the stages, and because it is the basis for the accomplishment of the great, i.e., of the benefit of self and others.

original: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //üîΩrgyas par byan  chen po rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir te /üîΩbyang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / bslab pa rnams dang / gzhi dang rtags la sogs pa ni theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o // rgyas par byan  chen po rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir te / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / bslab pa rnams dang / gzhi dang rtags la sogs pa ni theg pa chen po'o //
translated: In brief, it is the ten spiritual levels of the bodhisattva together with their result.üîΩIt is extensive because it possesses seven kinds of greatness.

original: de'i @191b mdo ni smos pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i @191b mdo ni smos pa'i phyir te /
translated: The seven kinds of greatness are: the greatness of the spiritual level, the greatness of the spiritual gene, the greatness of the generating of the resolve, the greatness of the generating of the spiritual conception, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the spiritual levels, the greatness of the stores of merit and intuition, the greatness of the spiritual master, the greatness of the spiritual friend, the greatness of the spiritual practice, the greatness of the relinquishment, the greatness of the direct intuition, the greatness of the powers, the greatness of the knowledge of the arts and crafts, the greatness of the spiritual levels, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of the perfections, the greatness of

original: rkyang pa dang tshig tu sbyar ba'i sgrar snang ba 'dod pa'i don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: rkyang pa dang tshig tu sbyar ba'i sgrar snang ba 'dod pa'i don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa'i tshig go //
translated: The words of the speaker are the representations of the hearer that are in conformity with the aspects of the intended meaning that are associated with the sounds that appear as individual letters and words.

original: gal te de lta yin na byang chub sems dpas de ji ltar bshad de /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na byang chub sems dpas de ji ltar bshad de /
translated: If that is so, how can the Bodhisattvas teach?

original: nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni des ma bshad do zhe na /
analyzed: nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni des ma bshad do zhe na /
translated: The representations of the hearer are not taught by them.

original: de'i dbang gis byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de'i dbang gis byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya ste /
translated: They are so called because they arise by the power of those representations.

original: lha la sogs pa'i dbang gis rmi lam na bstan bcos dang sngags la sogs pa rnyed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i dbang gis rmi lam na bstan bcos dang sngags la sogs pa rnyed pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the acquisition of treatises, spells, etc., in dreams by the power of gods, etc.

original: gzhan du na ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan du na ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, how could the speech of the Buddhas be called ‚Äúthe teaching‚Äù?

original: re zhig ngag gi rang bzhin ni mdor mi 'thad de /
analyzed: re zhig ngag gi rang bzhin ni mdor mi 'thad de /
translated: To begin with, the nature of speech is untenable in brief.

original: yi ge re re ni don rtogs par byed par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge re re ni don rtogs par byed par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because each individual letter is not suitable to convey the meaning.

original: rim gyis 'byung ba lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams kyang tshogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams kyang tshogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the sequential arising of the non-simultaneous is not suitable to assemble.

original: de ltar na bdag ma thob pa'i ngag ni ming la 'jug par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag ma thob pa'i ngag ni ming la 'jug par mi rung ngo //
translated: Thus, speech, which is not obtained by the self, cannot be applied to names.

original: yi ge'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i sgra byung ba yang ming la cung zad kyang gsal bar mi byed de /
analyzed: yi ge'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i sgra byung ba yang ming la cung zad kyang gsal bar mi byed de /
translated: And a sound that is not of the nature of a letter does not manifest a name in the least.

original: de ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yang mdor mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yang mdor mi 'thad do //
translated: Thus, the nature of a name is not tenable in any way.

original: de lta bas na ji skad bstan pa nyid mdor rigs te /
analyzed: de lta bas na ji skad bstan pa nyid mdor rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that the teaching is just as it was stated.

original: chos mngon pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo de las so //
analyzed: chos mngon pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo de las so //
translated: It is from the Mahayana sutra called the Abhidharma.

original: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste /
translated: Aspect means distinction.

original: de dag nyid phan tshun ma 'dres pas khyad par du 'gyur bas na khyad par ram /
analyzed: de dag nyid phan tshun ma 'dres pas khyad par du 'gyur bas na khyad par ram /
translated: Since those very [aspects] are distinguished by being unmixed with each other, they are distinguished.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos rnams las mchog tu gyur pa dang / lhag pa'i phyir khyad par te /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos rnams las mchog tu gyur pa dang / lhag pa'i phyir khyad par te /
translated: Or, because they are superior and higher than the dharmas of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so forth, they are distinguished.

original: byang chub chen po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub chen po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they accomplish great enlightenment.

original: bcu zhes bya ba ni grangs te /
analyzed: bcu zhes bya ba ni grangs te /
translated: Ten means number.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gsung bgrang bar bya ba khyad par du 'phags pas bstan bcos kyi lus rnam par 'jog go /'di dag gi gsung ni rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gsung bgrang bar bya ba khyad par du 'phags pas bstan bcos kyi lus rnam par 'jog go /'di dag gi gsung ni rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pas /
translated: The body of the treatise is established by the teaching of the Buddha, which is preeminent in ten ways.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: The speech of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, is preeminent in ten ways.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i gti mug gi gnyid gnyis zad pa dang // shes bya thams cad la shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i gti mug gi gnyid gnyis zad pa dang // shes bya thams cad la shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas te /
translated: The word buddha means one who has awakened from the sleep of the two kinds of ignorance, afflicted and unafflicted, and who has expanded his knowledge to all objects of knowledge.

original: skyes bu gnyid sad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skyes bu gnyid sad pa bzhin no //
translated: He is like a man who has awakened from sleep.

original: me tog ku mu ta rgyas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: me tog ku mu ta rgyas pa bzhin no //
translated: He is like a kumuta lotus that has blossomed.

original: shes bya ni shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes bya ni shes par bya'o //
translated: The objects of knowledge are to be known.

original: gnas kyi sgras phye ba'i phyir gnas pa rnams ni 'dus byas rnams te /
analyzed: gnas kyi sgras phye ba'i phyir gnas pa rnams ni 'dus byas rnams te /
translated: The word ‚Äúabode‚Äù is used to distinguish the abiding things, which are the conditioned things,

original: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur @192a * //üîΩpa dang / rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur @192a * //üîΩpa dang / rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: from the defiled and the purified things.

original: 'dus ma byas rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: Unconditioned states are not.üîΩ

original: gnas kyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas kyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unconditioned are not the basis because they do not have the meaning of a basis.üîΩThe basis of those is the store consciousness, because it is the cause and the support, as appropriate.üîΩThe object of knowledge is the basis of the object of knowledge, because the object of knowledge is not in conflict with the consciousness that is the result of evolution.

original: de dag gi gnas ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste rgyu yin pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste rgyu yin pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro //
translated: The object of knowledge is the basis of the object of knowledge, because the object of knowledge is not in conflict with the consciousness that is the result of evolution.

original: shes bya nyid shes bya'i rten du 'gyur te /üîΩshes bya nyid kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang mi 'gal lo //üîΩshes bya'i gnas nyid khyad par yin pas /
analyzed: shes bya nyid shes bya'i rten du 'gyur te / shes bya nyid kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang mi 'gal lo // shes bya'i gnas nyid khyad par yin pas /
translated: The special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.

original: shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par te /
translated: The special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags pas shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung ste /üîΩsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhes bya bar thams cad du rnal ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags pas shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhes bya bar thams cad du rnal ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: The special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.

original: shes bya'i mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid de de mtshon par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes bya'i mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid de de mtshon par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The special basis of the object of knowledge is the special basis of the object of knowledge.üîΩThe special basis of the object

original: ngo bo nyid gsum zhes bya ba la yongs su grub pa ni dngos po yin pas ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gsum zhes bya ba la yongs su grub pa ni dngos po yin pas ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The three natures are: the perfected nature, which is a reality because it is an entity;

original: kun brtags pa ni ngo bo nyid dang 'dra bas ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: kun brtags pa ni ngo bo nyid dang 'dra bas ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the imagined nature, which is a reality because it is similar to a reality;

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi gnas yin pas gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi gnas yin pas gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: and the relative nature, which is a reality because it is the cause of error and the basis of the perfected nature.

original: de la yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs pas spyi'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de la yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs pas spyi'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The perfected nature is the universal characteristic of all things because it is included in all things.

original: gzhan gyi dbang ni lus la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i rnam par rig pa rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir dang gi mtshan nyid do /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang ni lus la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i rnam par rig pa rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir dang gi mtshan nyid do /
translated: The relative nature is the particular characteristic of all things because the consciousnesses that are the errors of body, etc. are mutually distinct.

original: sa'i khams la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Like the earth element, etc.

original: dper na sa'i khams sra bar yongs su gcod pa na gzhan ma yin yang sra ba'i mtshan nyid ces brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sa'i khams sra bar yongs su gcod pa na gzhan ma yin yang sra ba'i mtshan nyid ces brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, when the earth element is ascertained as solidity, it is not something else that is said to have the characteristic of solidity.

original: yang dper na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams dang / mdo sde pa'i skye ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dper na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams dang / mdo sde pa'i skye ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the characteristics of a great person and the arising, etc. of the Sautrantikas.

original: des na de ni shes bya'ang yin la mtshan nyid kyang yin pa'am yang na shes bya'i mtshan nyid yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: des na de ni shes bya'ang yin la mtshan nyid kyang yin pa'am yang na shes bya'i mtshan nyid yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Therefore, it is the characteristic of the knowable because it is both a knowable and a characteristic, or because it is the characteristic of the knowable.

original: de gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa las grol ba'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro //
analyzed: de gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa las grol ba'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro //
translated: It is not other than that and is free from other and not other, as is appropriate.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //üîΩ'dis shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // 'dis shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'am /
translated: Therefore, their teachings are especially exalted.üîΩThis is the entry into the characteristic of the knowable,

original: 'di ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa ste /
translated: or this is the entry into the characteristic of the knowable, hence it is the entry into the characteristic of the knowable.

original: 'jug pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Entry is clear realization.

original: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Mere representation is the entry into the characteristic of the knowable.

original: de nyid khyad @192b par te /
analyzed: de nyid khyad @192b par te /
translated: That itself is special.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: Therefore, their teachings are especially exalted.

original: 'jug pa de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa zhes bya ba rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de /
analyzed: 'jug pa de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa zhes bya ba rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe speech is distinguished by the special cause and effect of that engagement‚Äù means that the engagement is just the representation.

original: de'i rgyu ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la sbyor ba'i dus na 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma dag pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la sbyor ba'i dus na 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma dag pa rnams so //
translated: The cause of that is the impure mundane perfections at the time of practice on the stage of action in faith.

original: 'bras bu ni rab tu rtogs pa'i dus na de dag nyid 'jig rten las 'das par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rab tu rtogs pa'i dus na de dag nyid 'jig rten las 'das par gyur pa ste /
translated: The effect is the transformation of those perfections into the supramundane at the time of realization,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin pa'o //
translated: which is accompanied by the purity of superior intention.

original: de dag nyid des 'jug pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par te /
analyzed: de dag nyid des 'jug pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par te /
translated: Those perfections are the special cause and effect of that engagement.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: By that, his speech is distinguished.

original: de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la rnam par rig pa tsam de nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ni de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la rnam par rig pa tsam de nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ni de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe special cause and effect of that cultivation‚Äù means that the cause and effect of that representation is the cause and effect of that.

original: bsgom pa ni de goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni de goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Cultivation is the practice of that.

original: des rab tu dbye bas de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba ste /
analyzed: des rab tu dbye bas de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba ste /
translated: The classification of the cause and result of that meditation is the classification of the cause and result of meditation.

original: sa bcu'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sa bcu'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The essence of the ten grounds.

original: de nyid khyad par te /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par te /
translated: That itself is the distinction.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: By that, their speech is especially exalted.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa goms par byed pa tha dad pa'i sa de dag nyid la de nye bar 'dzin pa la brtson pa na de la slob pa yin pas bslab pa gsum rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa goms par byed pa tha dad pa'i sa de dag nyid la de nye bar 'dzin pa la brtson pa na de la slob pa yin pas bslab pa gsum rnam par gzhag go //
translated: When they are diligent in upholding that on those very grounds that are different in terms of cultivating the perfections, they are training in that, so the three trainings are presented.

original: tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa ste /
translated: The training that is based on ethics is the training of superior ethics.

original: sa de dag nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa spong ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / dge ba thams cad spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yang dag par len to //
analyzed: sa de dag nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa spong ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / dge ba thams cad spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yang dag par len to //
translated: On those very grounds, bodhisattvas take up the three kinds of ethics: the vow of a bodhisattva, acting for the welfare of sentient beings, and engaging in all virtue.

original: gdul ba srab kyi kha lo sgyur ba bzhin du lam log par zhugs pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las rnams 'dis sdom pas na sdom pa'o //
analyzed: gdul ba srab kyi kha lo sgyur ba bzhin du lam log par zhugs pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las rnams 'dis sdom pas na sdom pa'o //
translated: It is a vow because it restrains the activities of body, etc. which are engaged in wrong paths, like a bridle restrains a horse's head.

original: de ltar na bslab pa nyid lhag pa'i tshul khrims te /
analyzed: de ltar na bslab pa nyid lhag pa'i tshul khrims te /
translated: Thus, the training itself is the superior morality,

original: tshul khrims dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is practiced together with morality.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims nyid khyad par te /
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims nyid khyad par te /
translated: The superior morality itself is the distinction,

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: and by it their speech is distinguished.

original: sems kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o //
translated: The training that is based on mind is the training in superior mind.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'i mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni bzang skyong dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'i mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni bzang skyong dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The concentrations such as the hero's march, the sky treasury, etc.

original: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la ting nge 'dzin @193a * //
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la ting nge 'dzin @193a * //
translated: The training in superior mind is the concentration itself,

original: nyid sems su ston pas gsungs so zhes smras te /
analyzed: nyid sems su ston pas gsungs so zhes smras te /
translated: because it is taught that the mind is the concentration.

original: sems kyi rnam pa bris zhes bya ba las su bstan pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa bris zhes bya ba las su bstan pa lta bu'o //
translated: as in the statement: ‚ÄúThe forms of mind are drawn.‚Äù

original: shes rab kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o //
translated: The training that is based on wisdom is the training in superior wisdom.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen po'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen po'o //
translated: Nonconceptual wisdom is the antidote to all conceptual thoughts.üîΩThe training in superior morality is taught in terms of the path of preparation and the actual stage of the path.

original: de la sbyor ba ba'i dngos gzhi'i dbang du byas /üîΩde'i rjes la thob pa'i dbang du byas /
analyzed: de la sbyor ba ba'i dngos gzhi'i dbang du byas / de'i rjes la thob pa'i dbang du byas /
translated: The training in superior concentration is taught in terms of the path of preparation and the actual stage of the path.üîΩThe training in superior wisdom is taught in terms of the path of preparation, the actual stage of the path, and the stage of subsequent attainment.

original: de'i bla na med pa'i dbang du byas nas tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi bslab pa 'di dag ni lam gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i bla na med pa'i dbang du byas nas tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi bslab pa 'di dag ni lam gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: These trainings in superior morality, concentration, and wisdom are the nature of the path.

original: de'i 'bras bu spangs pa dang / ye shes kyi khyad par gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu spangs pa dang / ye shes kyi khyad par gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan te /
translated: The result of the trainings is taught as the special qualities of elimination and gnosis.

original: bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The result of these trainings is their result.

original: de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la spangs pa yang yin pas de'i 'bras bu spangs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la spangs pa yang yin pas de'i 'bras bu spangs pa ste /
translated: Since that is the result of the trainings and it is also an elimination, it is the result of the trainings that is an elimination.

original: glo bur gyi sgrib pa dang bral ba de bzhin nyid rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: glo bur gyi sgrib pa dang bral ba de bzhin nyid rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: The Reality which is free from adventitious obscuration is Liberation.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: The Nirvana which is not a resting place is Nirvana itself, because it is seen as peace.

original: de shes pa ni chags pa'i gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: de shes pa ni chags pa'i gnas ma yin no //
translated: The knowledge of that is not a place of attachment.

original: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The Element of Nirvana which is without a remaining substratum is not a resting place.

original: de nyid khyad par te /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par te /
translated: That itself is the distinction.

original: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: By that, their speech is distinguished.

original: bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result of these trainings is the result of that.

original: de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la ye shes kyang yin pas de'i 'bras bu ye shes so //
analyzed: de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la ye shes kyang yin pas de'i 'bras bu ye shes so //
translated: That is the result of that and also intuition, thus it is the result of that, intuition.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Buddha‚Äôs Body and Speech are called

original: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The Essential Body is stainless, unobstructed intuition,

original: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which is synonymous with the Dharma Body.

original: 'di ltar gnyi ga yang rnam par rtog pa kun tu mi 'byung na rnam par mi rtog pa dang 'di bye brag ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnyi ga yang rnam par rtog pa kun tu mi 'byung na rnam par mi rtog pa dang 'di bye brag ci yod ce na /
translated: If both are non-conceptual, what is the difference between them?

original: de ni gnyen po ste bya ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gnyen po ste bya ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The former is the antidote, and is accompanied by activity.

original: 'di ni de'i 'bras bu bya ba byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni de'i 'bras bu bya ba byas pa ste /
translated: The latter is its result, and is the cessation of activity.

original: 'di ni bye brag go //
analyzed: 'di ni bye brag go //
translated: This is the difference between them.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni de'i dbang gis thob pa ste ;
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni de'i dbang gis thob pa ste ;
translated: The Enjoyment Body is attained by the power of that.

original: ye shes khyad par can des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa so sor myong ngo //
analyzed: ye shes khyad par can des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa so sor myong ngo //
translated: By that special intuition, the great bodhisattva experiences the enjoyment of the Dharma in common with the bodhisattvas of special intuition.

original: phyi rol rnam par dag pa'i ye shes med par byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dang / tshogs lhag ma @193b yang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol rnam par dag pa'i ye shes med par byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dang / tshogs lhag ma @193b yang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Without the intuition of the external purification, the bodhisattva would not complete the remaining accumulations and activities.

original: sprul pa ni de'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes nyid kyi bye brag go //
analyzed: sprul pa ni de'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes nyid kyi bye brag go //
translated: The Emanation Body is a special aspect of that intuition attained subsequent to the special intuition.

original: des de kho na las rab tu mi nyams shing byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa mi gtong bas las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bya ba sgrub bo //
analyzed: des de kho na las rab tu mi nyams shing byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa mi gtong bas las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bya ba sgrub bo //
translated: It is the activity of the bodhisattvas who are beginners and of the sravakas, because it does not fall away from reality and does not abandon the enjoyment of the bodhisattvas.

original: mig gi dbang po dang / de'i rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs kyi dpe rnams dang sbyar te /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po dang / de'i rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs kyi dpe rnams dang sbyar te /
translated: The eye faculty, its consciousness, and the examples of form are applied.

original: de med na de med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med na de med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that does not exist, that does not exist.

original: de nyid khyad par te /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par te /
translated: That itself is the distinction.

original: des de dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: des de dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: By that, their speech is especially exalted.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa las khyad par du byas pa zhes bya ba ni der ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgnas bcu po 'di dag ces bya ba ni de dag la theg pa chen po'i don mtha' dag gnas pas gnas te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa las khyad par du byas pa zhes bya ba ni der ma bstan pa'i phyir ro // gnas bcu po 'di dag ces bya ba ni de dag la theg pa chen po'i don mtha' dag gnas pas gnas te /
translated: The phrase distinguished from the sravaka vehicle means that it is not taught there.

original: gzhi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase these ten topics means that the entire meaning of the Mahayana is contained in them, so they are called topics, which means bases.

original: gang dag byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshad pa dag go zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa dag go zhes smos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar des gnang nas bshad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang dag byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshad pa dag go zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa dag go zhes smos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar des gnang nas bshad pa'i phyir te /
translated: The correct statement would be those which the Bodhisattva explains for the sake of the Bodhisattva, but the Lord said those which are taught, because they are explained with his permission in the presence of the Buddha.

original: sa bcu pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa bcu pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Like the Ten Stages, etc.

original: de'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says, in the presence of the Lord.

original: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni lam de sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bstan pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni lam de sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bstan pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word supreme means that the path is supreme because it is taught to become Buddhahood.

original: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung khyad par rnam par bcus khyad par du 'phags pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi srid du dogs nas smras pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung khyad par rnam par bcus khyad par du 'phags pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi srid du dogs nas smras pa'o //
translated: How is the Tathagata's speech superior by these ten distinctions? He says, ...by these ten distinctions, it is superior to the speech of the Sravakas and the Pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'di ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan par mi dmigs la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan par mi dmigs la /
translated: Because the six topics, etc. are not found in the teaching of the Sravakayana,

original: bye brag la sogs pa la ni de dmigs te /
analyzed: bye brag la sogs pa la ni de dmigs te /
translated: but they are found in the Vaipulya, etc.

original: de tsam gyis ni bye brag yi sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mi 'gyur ro zhes gzhan gyi skabs su 'gyur ba yid la bzhag nas /
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni bye brag yi sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mi 'gyur ro zhes gzhan gyi skabs su 'gyur ba yid la bzhag nas /
translated: the words of a non-Buddhist.

original: gnas bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros so //üîΩde ni byang chub kyang yin la chen po'ang yin pa'am /
analyzed: gnas bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros so // de ni byang chub kyang yin la chen po'ang yin pa'am /
translated: The ten topics are the means of accomplishing great enlightenment.

original: chen po rnams kyi byang chub yin pas byang chub chen po'o //
analyzed: chen po rnams kyi byang chub yin pas byang chub chen po'o //
translated: It is great enlightenment because it is enlightenment or it is the enlightenment of the great beings.

original: ye shes dang spangs pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: ye shes dang spangs pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: It is the nature of the special abandonment and special pristine wisdom.

original: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa dag / spangs pa yin te de spangs pas //
analyzed: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa dag / spangs pa yin te de spangs pas //
translated: It is the abandonment of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience.

original: dri med ye shes thogs pa med //
analyzed: dri med ye shes thogs pa med //
translated: The stainless pristine wisdom is unobstructed.

original: 'di ni byang chub rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub rnam pa bzhi //
translated: This is the fourfold enlightenment.

original: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //üîΩde kun @194a * //üîΩtu sgrub par byed cing thob par byed pa ni gnas bcu po dag yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // de kun @194a * // tu sgrub par byed cing thob par byed pa ni gnas bcu po dag yin gyi /
translated: As it is said.üîΩIt is the ten topics that accomplish and attain that.

original: dngos po drug gam /
analyzed: dngos po drug gam /
translated: The six topics are the six transcendences.

original: gtso bo la sogs pa ni ma yin pas de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no //
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa ni ma yin pas de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no //
translated: but not the principal one, etc. Therefore, they are not the word of the Buddha.

original: shin tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shin tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúVery reasonable‚Äù means that it is endowed with valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar 'og nas gtan la 'bebs so //üîΩmthun pa zhes bya ba ni mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'og nas gtan la 'bebs so // mthun pa zhes bya ba ni mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is established as such below.üîΩ‚ÄúConsistent‚Äù means that it is manifest.

original: rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is synonymous with ‚Äúin conformity with.‚Äù

original: 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba ni skyon med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba ni skyon med pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúNot contradictory‚Äù means that it is faultless.

original: ji ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa shes pa'am /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa shes pa'am /
translated: It is not like the knowledge of the six categories, etc.,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa skyon dang bcas shing sangs rgyas nyid dang mi mthun pa ltar gnas bcu po 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa skyon dang bcas shing sangs rgyas nyid dang mi mthun pa ltar gnas bcu po 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: or the ≈õrƒÅvakayƒÅna, which is faulty and not in conformity with buddhahood. These ten points are not like that.

original: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba smos pa ni sngar bshad pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i don ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba smos pa ni sngar bshad pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i don ston pa'o //
translated: Here, the term ‚Äúverse‚Äù indicates the teaching of the meaning that was previously explained and will be explained below.

original: 'di ltar gzhan la ma mthong la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan la ma mthong la /
translated: It is not seen in others.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub chen po mngon du 'gyur ba dang / grangs dang go rims kyi dgos pa 'thad pa dang bcas pa rnam par 'grel te /üîΩ'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du re zhig chos rnams kyi rgyu la mkhas pa la brten nas rgyu 'di las 'bras bu 'di 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub chen po mngon du 'gyur ba dang / grangs dang go rims kyi dgos pa 'thad pa dang bcas pa rnam par 'grel te / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du re zhig chos rnams kyi rgyu la mkhas pa la brten nas rgyu 'di las 'bras bu 'di 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the great enlightenment is actualized, and the purpose of the enumeration and sequence is established.

original: 'bras bu 'di'i rgyu ni 'di yin no zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par byas te /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'di'i rgyu ni 'di yin no zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par byas te /
translated: Thus, a bodhisattva first, at the very outset, on the basis of skill in the means of the causal process of things, becomes skilled in dependent origination, thinking, from this cause that effect arises, and this is the cause of that effect.

original: de yang rgyu bstan pa med par ni mi shes so //
analyzed: de yang rgyu bstan pa med par ni mi shes so //
translated: Moreover, that is not known without teaching the cause.

original: rgyu ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin te /
translated: The cause is the fundamental consciousness.

original: rgyu med pa dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu spangs nas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu med pa dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu spangs nas bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching is given after eliminating the non-cause and the contrary cause.

original: de'i 'og tu sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' spangs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos de dag gi mtshan nyid shes par byas te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' spangs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos de dag gi mtshan nyid shes par byas te /
translated: After that, by eliminating the extremes of superimposition and denial, he understands the characteristics of those things that are dependently originated.

original: med pa dang yod pa lhan cig gcig tu 'dogs pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: med pa dang yod pa lhan cig gcig tu 'dogs pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'o //
translated: The superimposition of the nonexistent and the existent together is a superimposition.

original: yod pa la skur cing sel ba ni skur pa 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa la skur cing sel ba ni skur pa 'debs pa'o //
translated: The denial and elimination of the existent is a denial.

original: sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba'i mtha' 'di gnyis ni g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba'i mtha' 'di gnyis ni g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste //
translated: These two extremes of superimposition and denial are synonymous with the abyss.

original: 'di gnyis la gnas na dbu ma'i lam las rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di gnyis la gnas na dbu ma'i lam las rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one abides in these two, one falls from the path of the middle way.

original: de gnyis spangs pa la mkhas pa ni yang dag par so sor rtog pa ste /üîΩmed pa kun brtags pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing mi skur te med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis spangs pa la mkhas pa ni yang dag par so sor rtog pa ste / med pa kun brtags pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing mi skur te med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The expertise in abandoning these two is correct analytical discrimination.

original: yod pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not superimpose the non-existent imagined reality and one does not deny the dependent reality because it exists.üîΩOne does not deny the existent.

original: gzhan gyi dbang la sgro 'dogs par @194b mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang la sgro 'dogs par @194b mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not superimpose the dependent reality because it exists.

original: med pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not deny the non-existent.

original: skur par yang mi byed de 'khrul pa tsam du yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skur par yang mi byed de 'khrul pa tsam du yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not deny the dependent reality because it exists as a mere error.

original: yongs su grub pa la sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa la sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not superimpose the perfected reality because it exists.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skur bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skur bar mi byed do //
translated: Therefore, one does not denigrate.

original: yang na 'dir sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa'i mtha' spangs pa la mkhas pa 'di ni gang gzhan gyi dbang la kun brtags pa med pas sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / yongs su grub pa yod pas skur par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dir sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa'i mtha' spangs pa la mkhas pa 'di ni gang gzhan gyi dbang la kun brtags pa med pas sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / yongs su grub pa yod pas skur par mi byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, this skill in avoiding the extremes of superimposition and denial is that, since the imagined does not exist in the relative, one does not superimpose it; and since the perfect does exist, one does not deny it.

original: mtha' gnyis spangs pas ngo bo nyid gsum la mkhas pa de lta bu la brten nas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyis ji skad smos pa'i shes bya'i mtshan nyid rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis spangs pas ngo bo nyid gsum la mkhas pa de lta bu la brten nas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyis ji skad smos pa'i shes bya'i mtshan nyid rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, on the basis of such skill in the three natures, one should realize the nature of the knowable as described, by means of the mere representation of consciousness.

original: khong du chud pa ni rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: khong du chud pa ni rtogs pa ste /
translated: Realization is the understanding of that.

original: 'jug pa dang mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: It is the engagement and the direct realization of that.

original: yang na gang gis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na gang gis rtogs pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is that by means of which one realizes.

original: de'i 'og tu 'jug pa rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de dang mthun pa kun rdzob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag don dam par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'jug pa rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de dang mthun pa kun rdzob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag don dam par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: After that, one should realize the ultimate of the six relative perfections that are in accord with the mere representation of consciousness, which is the engagement.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin par bya'o //
translated: One should be seized by the purity of superior intention.

original: 'dun pa dang mos pa ni bsam pa ste /
analyzed: 'dun pa dang mos pa ni bsam pa ste /
translated: Aspiration and belief are the attitude.

original: shes nas dad pas bsdus pa'i phyir de'i tshe de gnyis lhag par che'o //
analyzed: shes nas dad pas bsdus pa'i phyir de'i tshe de gnyis lhag par che'o //
translated: Since they are included in faith born of insight, at that time those two are especially great.

original: 'jug pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang don gcig go //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang don gcig go //
translated: Engagement is synonymous with the realization of perfect enlightenment.

original: sa bcu dag tu bslab pa gsum la bslab cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsgoms pas de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sa bcu dag tu bslab pa gsum la bslab cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsgoms pas de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: One should complete those perfections in three incalculable eons by training in the three trainings on the ten grounds.

original: de'i 'og tu de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa thob par bya'o /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa thob par bya'o /
translated: Then, one should attain the result of those perfections, the elimination of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience and the attainment of stainless, unimpeded, omniscient gnosis.

original: de ltar na go rims dang grangs kyi dgongs pa dang / byang chub chen po dang mthun pa yang dngos dang zhar la bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na go rims dang grangs kyi dgongs pa dang / byang chub chen po dang mthun pa yang dngos dang zhar la bshad pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the topics of order and number and the topics of concordance with the great vehicle are both directly and indirectly explained.

original: go rims ni 'di kho na yin la grangs kyang bcu kho na ste /
analyzed: go rims ni 'di kho na yin la grangs kyang bcu kho na ste /
translated: The order is just this, and the number is just ten,

original: mi nyung mi mang ngo //
analyzed: mi nyung mi mang ngo //
translated: neither less nor more.

original: 'bras bu bye brag med par 'gyur ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi lam nyid sangs rgyas kyi lam nyid du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu bye brag med par 'gyur ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi lam nyid sangs rgyas kyi lam nyid du mi rung ngo //
translated: because the result would be without distinction.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas nas nyan thos kyi theg pa las ni gang du yang sangs rgyas kyi lam bstan pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas nas nyan thos kyi theg pa las ni gang du yang sangs rgyas kyi lam bstan pa med do //
translated: From the point of view of the bodhisattva, the path to Buddhahood is not taught anywhere in the Disciples‚Äô Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas ni nyan thos las khyad par du ma 'phags par yang mi 'dod de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni nyan thos las khyad par du ma 'phags par yang mi 'dod de /
translated: But it is not maintained that the Buddha is not superior to the disciples.

original: ston pa dang slob mar rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde bas na lam @195a * //
analyzed: ston pa dang slob mar rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // de bas na lam @195a * //
translated: For then there would be no distinction between teacher and taught.

original: gyi khyad par nye bar bstan pa 'ga' zhig bshad dgos te /
analyzed: gyi khyad par nye bar bstan pa 'ga' zhig bshad dgos te /
translated: Therefore, some special path must be taught.

original: de ni theg pa chen po 'di las gzhan du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ni theg pa chen po 'di las gzhan du mi 'thad do //
translated: But that is not tenable apart from this Great Vehicle.

original: de lta bas na byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid du mngon te /
analyzed: de lta bas na byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid du mngon te /
translated: Thus, the Great Vehicle is clearly the word of the Buddha, because it teaches the practice of great enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi las ni sangs rgyas ma yin pas bshad par mi nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi las ni sangs rgyas ma yin pas bshad par mi nus so //
translated: For the deeds of the Buddha cannot be taught by one who is not Buddha.

original: bstan pa 'dir ni theg pa chen po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bstan pa 'dir ni theg pa chen po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: In this teaching, the Great Vehicle is completely perfected.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa thams cad bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa thams cad bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no desire for anything else, since all aspects of the cause and result that are superior are explained.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this is the summary of the Great Vehicle,

original: ji snyed dang ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par dang bcas par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji snyed dang ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par dang bcas par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it teaches the distinctions of the knowable just as they are and in their full variety.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi dbyings //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi dbyings //
translated: The basic constituent since beginningless time

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang po'i mu med pas na thog ma med pa'i dus so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang po'i mu med pas na thog ma med pa'i dus so //
translated: Since there is no beginning, there is beginningless time.

original: dbyings ni rgyu ste sa bon no //
analyzed: dbyings ni rgyu ste sa bon no //
translated: The basic constituent is the cause, the seed.

original: gang dag gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag gi zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi'o //
translated: It is the basic constituent of all afflicted phenomena.

original: rnam par byang ba rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that of the purified phenomena,

original: 'di ltar 'og nas mang du thos pas bsgos pa'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pas bsdus pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'og nas mang du thos pas bsgos pa'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pas bsdus pa ma yin la /
translated: because later on it is said that the foundation that is imbued with much listening is not included in the foundation consciousness.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyi sa bon gang yod pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyi sa bon gang yod pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: It is the seed of all dharmas included in proper mental attention, as in the case of the store consciousness.

original: rten yin pa'i phyir chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te /
analyzed: rten yin pa'i phyir chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te /
translated: It is the foundation of all dharmas because it is their support,

original: rgyu yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: but not because it is their cause.

original: rten gyi don ni gnas kyi don te /
analyzed: rten gyi don ni gnas kyi don te /
translated: The meaning of support is the meaning of foundation,

original: rgyu'i don ni ma yin pas gnas logs shig tu smos so //
analyzed: rgyu'i don ni ma yin pas gnas logs shig tu smos so //
translated: but not the meaning of cause, so foundation is mentioned separately.

original: gzhan du na ni dbyings kyi sgra nyid kyis chog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni dbyings kyi sgra nyid kyis chog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the word dhƒÅtu alone would suffice.

original: de yod pas na 'gro kun dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yod pas na 'gro kun dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur //
translated: Because it exists, all beings attain nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gtan la dbab pa'i gnas su 'og nas bshad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gtan la dbab pa'i gnas su 'og nas bshad pa lta bu ste /
translated: This is as explained below in the section on the principles of the teaching.

original: skye ba kun nas nyon mongs pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na sems can dmyal ba la sogs par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa log pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba kun nas nyon mongs pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na sems can dmyal ba la sogs par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa log pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: The cessation of the afflictions of birth and so on is nirvana.

original: de'i phyir de thob pa yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de thob pa yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the attainment of nirvana is impossible if there is no store consciousness.

original: yang zhal nas gsungs pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sgrub ste /üîΩchos kun sa bon thams cad pa'i //
analyzed: yang zhal nas gsungs pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sgrub ste / chos kun sa bon thams cad pa'i //
translated: The existence of the store consciousness is also established by the scriptures of the Sutra school.üîΩThe sutra states:üîΩConsciousness containing all the seeds

original: rnam par shes pa kun @195b gzhi ste //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa kun @195b gzhi ste //
translated: is the storehouse of all dharmas.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sutra states:üîΩThe consciousness that contains all the seedsüîΩis the storehouse of all dharmas.

original: skye ba can zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams so //
analyzed: skye ba can zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams so //
translated: The term ‚Äúhaving birth‚Äù refers to conditioned dharmas.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams las rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams las rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúall afflicted dharmas‚Äù distinguishes them from purified dharmas.

original: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bang ba dang mdzod lta bur gyur pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor ba ma yin te /üîΩde'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bang ba dang mdzod lta bur gyur pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor ba ma yin te / de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The factors of affliction are not applied to the factors of purification as a cause and effect, because they are the antidotes to the factors of affliction.

original: mi mthun pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mi rung ngo //üîΩgang na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa de na gnyen po yod pa'i phyir gnas ni yin no /üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i don ni kun gzhi'i don no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mi rung ngo // gang na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa de na gnyen po yod pa'i phyir gnas ni yin no / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i don ni kun gzhi'i don no //
translated: It is not possible for incompatible things to be a cause and effect.üîΩThe factors of affliction and the factors of purification are incompatible.üîΩThe meaning of the basis is the meaning of the storehouse consciousness.

original: lhan cig 'jug pa'i don ni gnas kyi don te /
analyzed: lhan cig 'jug pa'i don ni gnas kyi don te /
translated: The meaning of simultaneous activity is the meaning of the basis.

original: sman nad med kyi thigs pa dug gi bum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa ni dug gi rgyu las 'byung bar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: sman nad med kyi thigs pa dug gi bum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa ni dug gi rgyu las 'byung bar mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not possible for a medicine that cures disease to be in a pot of poison, because it arises from a cause that is not poison.

original: der zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi gnas ston te /
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi gnas ston te /
translated: The word ‚Äúthere‚Äù indicates the basis of the latent afflictions.

original: bag chags tsam ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bag chags tsam ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The latent afflictions are not the storehouse consciousness.

original: bag chags kyi gnas dang bcas pa la bya ste /
analyzed: bag chags kyi gnas dang bcas pa la bya ste /
translated: It is the storehouse of latent impressions and what is stored in it.

original: dper na gzhan dag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gzhan dag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the mental consciousness of others.

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú Application‚Äù means

original: mngon du khyad par bag chags bsgo //
analyzed: mngon du khyad par bag chags bsgo //
translated: the latent impressions of manifest phenomena are stored.

original: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the phrase ‚Äúit is the storehouse of all the seeds.‚Äù

original: yang na sems can dag de'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang na sems can dag de'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Alternatively, ‚Äúapplication‚Äù means that sentient beings are applied to it as its self, which means that it appropriates them.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúit is the storehouse of all the seeds‚Äù is stated to distinguish the storehouse consciousness from the active forms of consciousness, such as the great elements, etc.,

original: ji ltar chen po la sogs pa gsal ba dag gtso bo la mi gsal ba'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba ltar chos thams cad kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de lta ni ma yin no zhes bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir /üîΩsa bon thams cad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar chen po la sogs pa gsal ba dag gtso bo la mi gsal ba'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba ltar chos thams cad kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de lta ni ma yin no zhes bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir / sa bon thams cad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: because the latter are not applied to the primal substance in the manner of a latent impression, that is, in a nonmanifest manner.

original: sa bon thams cad dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The storehouse consciousness is the storehouse of all the seeds because all the seeds arise and cease simultaneously with it.

original: sten pa'i tshul gyis kun gzhi dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa phan tshun du sbyor te /
analyzed: sten pa'i tshul gyis kun gzhi dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa phan tshun du sbyor te /
translated: The storehouse consciousness and the active forms of consciousness are applied to each other in the manner of mutual support.

original: gtso bo nyid gsal ba'ang yin la bdag gi ngo bo yang yin zhes bya ba de ni 'gal lo //
analyzed: gtso bo nyid gsal ba'ang yin la bdag gi ngo bo yang yin zhes bya ba de ni 'gal lo //
translated: It is contradictory to say that the principal is both manifest and the nature of the self.

original: dam pa dag la zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' khyad par can rnams la bshad pa ste /
analyzed: dam pa dag la zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' khyad par can rnams la bshad pa ste /
translated: It is explained to the holy ones means it is explained to the special bodhisattvas.

original: 'os yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'os yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are worthy.

original: 'os ma yin pas gzhan dag la ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'os ma yin pas gzhan dag la ni ma bshad do //
translated: It is not explained to others who are unworthy.

original: de ni len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste zhes bya ba ni lung gzhan gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam grangs su rnam par 'jog pas grags @196a * //üîΩpa ston to //
analyzed: de ni len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste zhes bya ba ni lung gzhan gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam grangs su rnam par 'jog pas grags @196a * // pa ston to //
translated: It is also called appropriating consciousness means that through another scripture, the existence of the foundation consciousness is established as a synonym of consciousness.

original: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing phra //
analyzed: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing phra //
translated: The appropriating consciousness is profound and subtle.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zab pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa'i blos kyang gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zab pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa'i blos kyang gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is profound because it is difficult for the intellect of mundane scholars to fathom.

original: phra ba ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phra ba ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is subtle because it is difficult for sravakas to understand.

original: de'i phyir de dag shes bya phra ba thams cad shes pa'i skabs ma yin pas nyan thos rnams la ma bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag shes bya phra ba thams cad shes pa'i skabs ma yin pas nyan thos rnams la ma bshad do //
translated: Therefore, they are not explained to the ≈õrƒÅvakas, because it is not the occasion for them to know all subtle objects of knowledge.

original: chu bo zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rgyud mi 'chad pa'i phyir te /
